original_title: Approval granted to sell Eggs imported from India
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Approval has been issued to sell eggs imported from India to consumers via supermarkets and Sathosa stores. Trade Minister Nalin Fernando says that the cabinet sub-committee appointed to look into the matter has received approval in this regard.
Eggs imported from India are currently being sold at a price of Rs. 35 to bakeries and hotels.
